name: Running Naked Simulator 2019
description:
Running Naked Simulator 2019 is an inappropriately exhilarating endless 8-bit runner.

Experience running naked like never before! With an abundance of levels set in numerous
environments, this simulator will supply you with an endless supply of entertainment. Earn new
characters, and break high-scores!

Key Features:

● Birthday Suits!
● Beautiful 8-bit Visuals: If you know what we mean…
● Addicting Endless Runner:

Easy to learn, hard to master!
